resources:
// App PDF Used permissions Access Storage Permission:
Used to read files (images) from sd-card and save pdf-files.

Grant permission later:
If you don\'t permit this now, you can do it later. Please open then \"Settings -> App info\" and choose \"Permissions\". Landscape Choose file with: // App titles Image to PDF Text to PDF + image + text | … Edit image Crop image Portrait // Snackbar // Toasts OK Cancel PDF successfully created. Images successfully created. Open folder? An error occurred. Open? Please install an app to perform action. Please choose an image. Choose or create a PDF file. Please enter text. Please wait. Saving image. Do not show again No supported file extension Image was edited. Saving? No Entry will be removed. OK? Can\'t open Directory. No files in directory. Please choose image file. Please choose PDF file. // Main menu Share PDF Open PDF Open app folder Settings Save Share PDF with: In the attachment you can find the PDF file: Help // Fragments Please enter title: Date Whatever you want ... // Text fragment Delete pages Which pages do you want to keep? Write or paste text Edit existing metadata Create new metadata // Image fragment Choose from gallery Take photo // Editor Contrast Hue Brightness Sharpness Saturation Exposure Highlight Shadow White Balance Color Balance Levels Min (Mid Adjust) // Dialogs Owner password User password Edit filename Choose filter Open file chooser // Settings About the app App directory Encryption Metadata License The app is completely open source and licensed under GPL3. Image quality Set the image quality. Higher quality results in (much) bigger PDF sizes. Backup Do you want to backup pdf files before manipulating, e.g. deleting or adding pages? Custom directory Format: \"/Download/PDF/\" Let empty to use the default directory (\"/Android/data/de.baumann.pdf/\"). Enter the path to your desired folder on your sdcard. The path must begin and end with \"/\" like \"/Download/PDF/\". If the desired directory does not exist, it will be generated automatically. Donate If you like the app, you can donate to me via Paypal. Changelog See what\'s new … (will open a website) Author Title Creator Keywords Subject Help dialog Show the help dialog on start. App info Open via the system settings the app info of the app. There you can, depending on your Android version, manage several things (Storage, network traffic, permissions, …). High (100%) Normal (80%) Low (60%) 100 80 60 //Image cropper Saving picture … Rotate left Rotate right //File chooser Cancel Share Rename Delete New filename (without file extension) Sort entries Sort by title Sort by date Sort by extension Search in titles Search in creation dates Search in extensions Today Yesterday Day before yesterday This month Own search Cancel search Files Title
